Back at Minion base:

"Fascinating." that one word echoed through the large darkened chamber.

Vorpal turned from his position on his throne, powerful optics bored
into Krytek, "Report."

"The subject continues to resist despite the force applied against it."
The information began to scroll across Vorpral's screens as well, even
as Krytek's emotionless tones continued, "Our modified X-6 units are
attempting leech energy from the subject, and yet the subject is still
attempting to both disable Animus and co-opt our units as well."

Vorpral chuckled from his throne, "He is strong. Is he having any
success in stealing our units?"

"No sir." Krytek's hands moved smoothly across his control panel as he
spoke. "I am countermanding any spurious orders they are receiving, and
am setting up encrypted command codes. The X-6 units are
unsophisticated units, had I not been monitoring them, it is possible
that this unit would have succeeded in his attempt."

Vorpal's optics dimmed as his own screens still showed the estimated
time of Cyclonus' arrival, they were nearly here. "Continue with the
test then, and apprise Cyclonus of the situation."

"Understood." Krytek's cold voice acknowledged the command.

 -------------------------------

Back on the surface of the moon:

--- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:

> AzureBlade: Wha... ? [He staggers a bit] Hold on, Minion, I'll take
> care of you in a moment.
> 
> He stops sending the panic attack at Animus, and instead concentrates
> on his own mechanical processes. By the same way his armor repairs
> itself, he starts consciously "repairing" the spheres, trying to
> persuade them that they are a part of him, that they are him. The
> energy drain is high, but he still has enough power to do something.
>
> Azureblade: See you in hell.
> 
> He aims and shoots two missile at point blank range at Animus.

The spheres successfully resist the attempt to be repaired even as they
continue to attempt to leech power from Azureblade. As he fired his
missiles tendrils of energy lash out out at the missiles from a few of
the spheres scoring their hulls and causing their power levels to drop.

The missiles though still maintain much of their deadly power, although
Animus does not. Animus continued to back away smiling at Azureblade
until he sees the twin streaks launch at him. With a last ditch effort
he attempts to throw up a shield, but it is not enough ... 

**BOOM!!** 

Flames erupt from the point of impact and debris is ripped from the
ground: stone, rock, metal all scatter across the surface of the ground
as a new crater appears on the surface of the moon. If Animus survived,
he is no longer visible to the naked optic.

Above Azureblade in the distance something like a large black fog
drifted between him and the sun for a moment. If an observer had
binocular vision they might determine they are ships, many of them. As
quickly and silently as the apparition came it began to drift on. At
the last moment though, just as the last of the armada was vanishing
into the ebony backdrop of space, five units detached from the main
group and began moving at high speed toward Azureblade's location. Even
as this happened the spheres attached to Azureblade's frame grew
heavier and heavier, attempting to leech power from him, draining from
him the very ability to resist!!

Preston
(Da'minion)
